sentences.en: A decision on this matter is pending.
A growing number of customers have been inquiring about the pending price rises.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的顾客在询问即将出现的涨价问题。

sentences.en: All charges against her are dropped pending the verification of her story.
sentences.cn: 在她的事情核实之前，所有针对她的指控都已撤回。

sentences.en: Diagnosis was deferred pending further assessment.
sentences.cn: 等候进一步的评估再诊断.

sentences.en: He was freed on bail pending an appeal.
He was released on bail pending committal proceedings.
He was released on bail pending further inquiries.
sentences.cn: 他获得保释，等候进一步调查。

sentences.en: Many trade disputes are pending, awaiting the outcome of the talks.
sentences.cn: 许多贸易争端悬而未决，等待会谈结果。

sentences.en: Mendoza is here pending his request for political asylum.
sentences.cn: 门多萨在要求获得政治庇护之前一直呆在这里。

sentences.en: Names of the dead and injured are being withheld pending notification of relatives.
sentences.cn: 在正式通知亲属前，伤亡人员名单暂时保密。

sentences.en: None of the four people killed was identified pending ( the ) notification of relatives.
sentences.cn: 四个 被害者 身份尚未确定,正待亲人前来辨认.

sentences.en: Pending his return let us get everything ready.
sentences.cn: 他回来之前,我们把一切准备好.

sentences.en: She had a libel action against the magazine pending.
sentences.cn: 她对该杂志提起的诽谤诉讼尚未判决。

sentences.en: The lawsuit is still pending in the state court.
sentences.cn: 这案子仍在州法庭等待定夺.
那件讼案因而尚未解决.

sentences.en: The matter is still pending in court.
sentences.cn: 这案子还在法院中悬而未决.

words.tran_cn: 悬而未决的；下垂的；未定的；向外伸出的

trans.tran_cn: 未决的，未定的，待定的，即将发生的

trans.tran_en: while waiting for something, or until something happens
